column.name: extract_document_uuid
column.remarks: ID of the request to IAP-OCR

column.name: asset_depreciation_beginning_date
column.remarks: Date of the beginning of the depreciation

column.name: suspense_statement_line_id
column.remarks: Request document from a bank statement line

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((display_type)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['line_section'::character varying, 'line_note'::character varying])::text[])) OR (account_id IS NOT NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: account_move_line_check_accountable_required_fields

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((display_type)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['line_section'::character varying, 'line_note'::character varying])::text[])) OR (((balance <= (0)::numeric) AND (amount_currency <= (0)::numeric)) OR ((balance >= (0)::numeric) AND (amount_currency >= (0)::numeric)))))
checkConstraint.name: account_move_line_check_amount_currency_balance_sign

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((display_type)::text <> ALL ((ARRAY['line_section'::character varying, 'line_note'::character varying])::text[])) OR ((amount_currency = (0)::numeric) AND (debit = (0)::numeric) AND (credit = (0)::numeric) AND (account_id IS NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: account_move_line_check_non_accountable_fields_null

column.name: is_matched
column.remarks: Is Matched With a Bank Statement

checkConstraint.constraint: ((NOT ((project_id IS NULL) AND (parent_id IS NOT NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: project_task_private_task_has_no_parent

checkConstraint.constraint: ((NOT ((recurring_task IS TRUE) AND (parent_id IS NOT NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: project_task_recurring_task_has_no_parent

column.name: calendar_last_notif_ack
column.remarks: Last notification marked as read from base Calendar

column.name: is_invoice_cron
column.remarks: Is a Subscription invoiced in cron

checkConstraint.constraint: (((next_invoice_date IS NULL) OR (start_date IS NULL) OR (next_invoice_date >= start_date)))
checkConstraint.name: sale_order_check_start_date_lower_next_invoice_date

checkConstraint.constraint: (((display_type IS NOT NULL) OR ((product_id IS NOT NULL) AND (product_uom IS NOT NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: sale_order_line_accountable_required_fields

checkConstraint.constraint: (((display_type IS NULL) OR ((product_id IS NULL) AND (price_unit = (0)::numeric) AND (product_uom_qty = (0)::numeric) AND (product_uom IS NULL) AND (customer_lead = (0)::double precision))))
checkConstraint.name: sale_order_line_non_accountable_null_fields

routine.name: gin_extract_query_trgm(text, internal, smallint, internal, internal, internal, internal)
gin_trgm_consistent(internal, smallint, text, integer, internal, internal, internal, internal)
gin_trgm_triconsistent(internal, smallint, text, integer, internal, internal, internal)
